name: Ratchet & Clank: Going Mobile
description: Ratchet and Clank are teleported into your cellphone and must fight their way out. Maximillan escapes a secret agent clank vid-comic and tries to stop the heroes. This game is a 2D platformer, featuring shooting. There are multiple rooms per level and the characters move horizontally or vertically through the rooms. Many levels include unlockable areas that the heroes must revisit later. These often contain titanium bolts that lead to the ultimate weapon: RYNO (Rip You a New One).
